shapes

Class Direction

  • java.lang.Object
    • shapes.Direction

  • public class Direction
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a direction in the 2D plane. Directions can be used to control which way shapes face and which way they move.

    Directions are represented in degrees (or radians) starting with 0 degrees pointing to the right, and increasing counterclockwise (like in a unit circle). For example, up is 90 degrees and left is 180 degrees.
